attributes.action: Buy a pirate ship for Nina, Tom, Tiff & Emma
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nina, Tom, Tiff & Emma need a pirate ship to smuggle and deal cocaine, oh and opium, on. Also, to grow cannabis plants on. Also, we need our smuggling to be legal. This WILL BE A VERY GOOD CAUSE!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
